title: Healthy Adjustments to Your Expectations
itunes:author: Guest: Randy Schroeder
itunes:summary:
All of us have expectations for what we thought marriage would be like. Yet, at some point, things won't go according to plan, and how you respond will make a big difference in those situations. John, Greg and Erin discuss what it looks like for couples to have healthy expectations for each other. Featuring Dr. Randy Schroeder.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "Simple Habits for Marital Happiness" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-07-05?recd=1436203

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/healthy-adjustments-to-your-expectations/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1436203

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
